name: AAP Turret
tooltip: > Engages closest visible enemy within <C>25 m</> on activation
> Deals <C>20-10</> ballistic damage, <C>600 rpm</>, <C>50</> round capacity
> Can attach to surfaces + Shells
> Maximum Efficiency: <C>25%</> increased range + ammo capacity
<B>> Can be disabled</>

name: Anchor
tooltip: > Can be used by Nano-wire to attach + pull towards location
> Restores aux power, aerial maneuver charges + clears snare on pull
> Useable by allies
> Can attach to surfaces + Shells
> Maximum Efficiency: <C>4 s</> Overcharge on pull

name: Bolster
tooltip: > While active: Bleed + knockdown immunity, <C>200</> max defense, <C>0 s</> defense regen delay, <C>40 /s</> defense regeneration
> Maximum Efficiency: <C>100%</> increased duration
<B>> While active:</> <C>50%</> <B>reduced speed + vitals restored from all sources</>

name: Spike
tooltip: > Deals <C>25</> vital damage, <C>4 s</> disable + snare to up to <C>6</> visible or detected enemies, executes if target below <C>25%</> vitals if scan hack
> Destroys visible or detected devices
<B>> Requires</> <C>50</> <B>Core charge for scan hack</>
<B>> Detected + unable to use Neuro-Link devices for</> <C>2 s</> <B>on successful hack</>

name: Combust
tooltip: > Deals <C>25</> fire damage + combust to up to <C>6</> visible or detected enemies, damage increased by <C>25%</> per addtional enemy if scan hack
<B>> Requires</> <C>50</> <B>Core charge for scan hack</>
<B>> Detected + unable to use Neuro-Link devices for</> <C>2 s</> <B>on successful hack</>

name: Parasite
tooltip: > Deals <C>5</> vitals damage every <C>0.5 s</> for <C>2.5 s</> to up to <C>6</> visible or detected enemies
> <C>300%</> of damage dealt restored to vitals, restores vitals to allies if scan hack
<B>> Requires</> <C>50</> <B>Core charge for scan hack</>
<B>> Detected + unable to use Neuro-Link devices for</> <C>2 s</> <B>on successful hack</>

name: Desync
tooltip: > Deals <C>5</> vital damage, <C>6 s</> desync to visible + up to <C>6</> detected enemies, damage increased by <C>5</> per addtional enemy, duration increased by <C>25%</> per addtional enemy if scan hack
> Desync: Scrambles radar, detections + targeting systems
<B>> Requires</> <C>50</> <B>Core charge for scan hack</>
<B>> Detected + unable to use Neuro-Link devices for</> <C>2 s</> <B>on successful hack</>

name: Cascade
tooltip: > Initiates <C>8 s</> Core detonation to up to <C>6</> visible or detected enemies
<B>> Can only be used while scanning</>
<B>> Requires</> <C>100</> <B>Core charge for scan hack</>
<B>> Detected + unable to use Neuro-Link devices for</> <C>2 s</> <B>on successful hack</>

name: Pathogen
tooltip: > Applies <C>10 /s</> hemorrhage + Necrosis to up to <C>6</> visible or detected enemies
<B>> Can only be used while scanning</>
<B>> Requires</> <C>100</> <B>Core charge for scan hack</>
<B>> Detected + unable to use Neuro-Link devices for</> <C>2 s</> <B>on successful hack</>

name: Lockdown
tooltip: > Disarms + applies <C>4 s</> stun + cripple to up to <C>6</> visible or detected enemies
<B>> Can only be used while scanning</>
<B>> Requires</> <C>100</> <B>Core charge for scan hack</>
<B>> Detected + unable to use Neuro-Link devices for</> <C>2 s</> <B>on successful hack</>

name: Deadzone
tooltip: > Creates <C>16 m</> disruptive zone on activation
> Disable + snare to enemies within zone
> Disables enemy devices within zone
> Shroud to allies within zone
> Can attach to surfaces
> Maximum Efficiency: <C>5</> vital damage every <C>0.5 s</> to enemies within Deadzone

name: Detonator
tooltip: > Deals <C>125-50</> explosive damage + knockback to targets within <C>2-4 m</> on activation
> Maximum Efficiency: <C>50%</> reduced activation delay
<B>> Can be disabled</>

name: Disrupter
tooltip: > <C>4 s</> stun, + snare to targets within <C>6 m</> on activation
> Can attach to surfaces + Shells
> Maximum Efficiency: <C>50%</> reduced activation delay

name: Firecracker
tooltip: > Deals <C>25-15</> explosive + <C>50-30</> fire damage to targets within <C>2-3 m</> + launches <C>10</> incendiary projectiles on impact
> Deals <C>100</> fire damage to targets within <C>5 m</> + launches <C>15</> incendiary projectiles on activation
> Incendiary projectile: Detonates after <C>1 s</>, igniting surface + dealing <C>5</> explosive + <C>5</> fire damage to targets within <C>2 m</>
> Maximum Efficiency: <C>100%</> increased duration

name: Laser Wire
tooltip: > Deals <C>75</> vital damage, <C>10 /s</> bleed + <C>4 s</> snare to enemies on activation
> <C>2</> charges
> Can attach to surfaces
> Maximum Efficiency: Applies hemorrhage
<B>> Can be disabled</>

name: Overcharge
tooltip: > While active: Disable immunity, <C>10%</> increased ground + climb speed, disable enemies + enemy devices within <C>3 m</> for <C>2 s</>
> Maximum Efficiency: <C>100%</> increased duration

name: Proximity Mine
tooltip: > Deals <C>125-50</> explosive damage, knockback + knockdown to targets within <C>2-5 m</> on activation
> Can attach to surfaces + Shells
> Maximum Efficiency: <C>50%</> reduced activation delay
<B>> Can be disabled</>

name: Relocator
tooltip: > Relocate to device location on activation, removes tagged
> Telefrag targets within <C>1 m</> on relocation
> <C>2 s</> disable to enemies + devices within <C>3 m</> on relocation
> Can attach to surfaces + Shells
> Maximum Efficiency: <C>50</> vitals + max vitals restored on activation
<B>> Can be disabled</>

name: Reserve Stim
tooltip: > <C>25</> vitals restored on activation, chemical heal
> <C>5 s</> bleed immunity if used while bleeding
> Maximum Efficiency: Becomes potent

name: Satchel Charge
tooltip: > Deals <C>150-50</> explosive damage, knockback + knockdown to targets within <C>2-5 m</> on activation
> Can attach to surfaces + Shells
> Maximum Efficiency: <C>50%</> of damage dealt as additional fire damage
<B>> Can be disabled</>

name: Shroud
tooltip: > While active: Undetectable by all equipment
> Maximum Efficiency: <C>100%</> increased duration

name: Tempest
tooltip: > Creates multiple charged nano-particle clouds on activation
> Clouds obscures vision + targeting systems
> Detected + snare to enemies on contact
> <C>5 s</> Overcharge to allies on contact
> Maximum Efficiency: <C>100%</> increased duration
<B>> Can be cleared with fire</>
